name: 3-point MACE
description: Condition record of acute myocardial infarction, hemorrhagic or ischemic stroke or sudden cardiac death during an inpatient or ER visit

name: 4-point MACE
description: 3-Point MACE $+$ inpatient or ER visit (hospitalization) with heart failure condition record

name: Acute myocardial infarction
description: Condition record of acute myocardial infarction during an inpatient or ER vist

name: Acute renal failure
description: Condition record of acute renal failure during an inpatient or ER visit

name: Glycemic control
description: First hemoglobin A1c measurement with value $\le$ 7\%

name: Hospitalization for heart failure
description: Inpatient or ER visit with heart failure condition record

name: Measured renal dysfunction
description: First creatinine measurement with value > 3 mg/dL

name: Revascularization
description: Procedure record of percutaneous coronary intervention or coronary artery bypass grafting during an inpatient or ER visit

name: Stroke
description: Condition record of hemorrhagic or ischemic stroke during an inpatient or ER visit

name: Sudden cardiac death
description: Condition record of sudden cardiac death during an inpatient or ER visit

name: Abnormal weight gain
description: Abnormal weight gain record of any type; note: weight measurements not used

name: Abnormal weight loss
description: Abnormal weight loss record of any type; note: weight measurements are not used

name: Acute pancreatitis
description: Condition record of acute pancreatitis during an inpatient or ER visit

name: All-cause mortality
description: From LEGEND-HTN

name: Bladder cancer
description: To be developed

name: Bone fracture
description: Condition record of a bone fracture during an outpatient or ER visit

name: Breast cancer

name: Diabetic ketoacidosis

name: Diarrhea
description: From LEGEND-HTN

name: Edema

name: Genitourinary infection
description: Condition record of any type of genital or urinary tract infection during an outpatient or ER vists

description: From LEGEND-HTN

name: Hypotension

name: Photosensitivity
